|[http://www2.ati.com/drivers/linux/catalyst_83_linux.html Catalyst 8.3]||[[5 March]], 2008|| X-Video support for the Xpress 1200. Blocky video and diagonal tearing no longer occurs when using X-Video. Fixes problems with screen resolutions not integer multiples of 64 pixels. Image brightness issues resolved.
|[http://www2.ati.com/drivers/linux/catalyst_83_linux.html Catalyst 8.3]||[[5 March]], 2008|| X-Video support for the Xpress 1200.
